text:
Abhishek-Aishwarya Make Aaradhya’s Birthday Super Special, Celebrate With Close Friends And Family!
Abhishek-Aishwarya Make Aaradhya’s Birthday Super Special, Celebrate With Close Friends And Family!
16th November is a very special day for the Bachchans. The entire family celebrated the birthday of the youngest member of their family, Aaradhya Bachchan.
Doting parents that Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan are, they took to their social media accounts to share special wishes for their daughter.
The entire Bachchan family came together in the evening for private party and celebrations.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
The pictures and videos that have made way on the internet have Aaradhya, her tiny tot friends.
The pictures also have Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, dad Abhishek Bachchan, granddad Amitabh Bachchan and grandmom Jaya Bachchan.
After dating for two years, Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya tied the knot in 2007 and the couple was blessed with a baby girl on November 16th, 2011.
(Also read: Aishwarya Rai Gives A Kickass Answer To Trolls Who Criticised Her Kiss Picture With Daughter Aaradhya)
The couple has never kept their daughter away from media spotlight, instead, we have frequently spotted her accompanying her parents to events and several occasions.
After a long gap of eight years, Aishwarya and Abhishek will reunite for a film titled 'Gulab Jamun'.
(Also read: Speaking On Pay Parity, Abhishek Reveals His Wife Aishwarya Got Paid More In 8 Out Of 9 Films They Did Together)
title: Abhishek-Aishwarya Make Aaradhya’s Birthday Super Special, Celebrate With Close Friends And Family!

The couple has never kept their daughter away from media spotlight, instead, we have frequently spotted her accompanying her parents to events and several occasions.
